Name: Login with valid username and password
Description: Verify that users can successfully log in with valid credentials
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page|2. Enter valid username 'testuser@example.com'|3. Enter valid password 'Test@123'|4. Click 'Sign In' button|5. Verify successful login|6. Check user dashboard loads
Expected Result: User should be redirected to dashboard with welcome message displayed
Preconditions: Valid user account exists in the system

Name: Login with invalid username
Description: Test login functionality with incorrect username
Steps: 1. Open login page|2. Enter invalid username 'nonexistent@test.com'|3. Enter any password|4. Click login button|5. Verify error message appears
Expected Result: System should display 'Invalid credentials' error message
Preconditions: Login page is accessible and functional

Name: Login with invalid password
Description: Verify system rejects login attempts with wrong password
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page|2. Enter valid username|3. Enter incorrect password|4. Attempt to login|5. Verify appropriate error handling
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed without revealing username validity
Preconditions: Valid username exists in system

Name: Password reset with invalid email
Description: Verify password reset handles non-existent email addresses
Steps: 1. Go to password reset page|2. Enter non-existent email address|3. Submit reset request|4. Verify system response
